NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
January 5, 1953
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
President, NAEB
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Graydon:
Sorry to be late in getting this to you, Graydon. I
have been out of Chapel Hill since just before Christmas.
Although I do not know Harry Scomia personally too well
(I have met him only), I believe on the basis of his outÂ¬
standing work in radio he would do a fine job. Therefore,
I vote for him.
I believe also that the arrangement Prank Schooley and
Jim Miles have suggested for the interim operation is
fine.
My very best wishes for the New Year.
Earl Wynn
W b
